feed.title: Metabase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.5
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.5 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.5/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.5 JAR:

51f44436b95deee73ae71b21f66321d82b8f12ca40577230b1d657378e000a73

Changelog

 **Bug fixes** - "scale: Timeseries" not working with Oracle database - "invalid time zone in DateTimeFormat(): +00:00" (#44128) - Don't sync JWT registered claims as login attributes (#43976) - Waterfall tool-tips do not correctly apply column value scaling (#44176) - Remove help@metabase.com from Error Diagnostic Modal (#44150) - Fix spaces in dashboard move toast (#44192)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.6
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.6 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.6/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.6 JAR:

3d7ad42870426be7cf9bbecc11b6847222c31e9a8f28703563a980538edecf29

Changelog

 **Enhancements** - Disable SQL analysis by default (#44346) **Bug fixes** - If you don't have access to the root collection but inner collections, you get permission errors in QuestionPicker (#44316) - Goal lines displayed incorrectly when axis scale is not linear (#44278) - Field values remapping with mixed PK and a FK targeting the same PK is broken in public dashboards (#44231) - StreamingResponse cannot be cast to class clojure.lang.Associative (#44160) - Error while exporting a pivot table without columns in v50.x (#44159) - Bar chart per week not showing proper information on Timeline (#23336) **Under the hood** - Rework measure search performance events (#44300) - Remove frontend code that checks `enable-query-caching` (#44250)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.49.18
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.49.18 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.49.18/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.49.18 JAR:

fda9ef4ddd4838e1512c56a96aca604283f80dc61210abc21954e04d3f790b97

Changelog

 **Bug fixes** - Can't sync JSONB columns with values in an array (#44459) - Database role is not respected when private key is used in Snowflake (#44351) - MB_JETTY_SKIP_SNI evaluating as string instead of bool, always evaluating to truthy if set (#42435) - On MongoDB, Distinct aggregation does not return a count because of lack of $size aggregation (#35425)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.7
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.7 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.7/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.7 JAR:

68fbd7ac014932448022f878ee6957855297acc4c4e3ba6a06421881cb77db4c

Changelog

 **Enhancements** - **Dashboards** - Disable dashboard filters with native models in the UI (#44288, #39932) . _Note: this has always been the behavior of native models, but we're making it clearer in the UI._ - **Admin** - Add missing question mark in the 'Clear cache' confirmation modal (#44453) - **Performance** - Set `useLocalSessionState` and/or `alwaysSendSetIsolation` connection properties for MySQL/MariaDB (#44507) - Attempt to set `READ_COMMITTED` data warehouse transaction isolation before `REPEATABLE_READ` (#44501) - Make the App DB transaction isolation level READ_COMMITTED for MySQL (#44505) - **Other** - Disable "make exports look pivoted" (#44561) _Note: this is a temporary measure. We're planning to revisit this feature in the nearest future._ - Add Upload CSVs button for customers with feature flag (#42381) - Make popularity scores for "recent items" work with zero items and zero max execution count (#44692) **Bug fixes** - **Query builder** - Missing schema name in data picker (#44460) - Query changes are not accepted by the QB for some table questions if the query wasn't run before that (#44415) - Choosing the fields to Join On Resets Join Type in the GUI Editor (#42858) - Can't set binning on join columns to "Don't bin" (#42681) - Cannot filter on text primary/foreign keys in the question editor (#41824) - Adding a string to UI question's custom column crashes Metabase (#41381) - Result inconsistencies with Preview in GUI editor (#40399) - Join condition is not automatically selected (#39448) - Cannot edit a custom field named like the column it's referencing (#40064) - **Visualizations** - Chart dimensions are not updated when adding breakouts one-by-one (#44532) - Table loses visualization settings when using a click action (#43294) - **Dashboards** - Unable to connect dashboard number filter to number variable of SQL query card (#44266) - Field values remapping with mixed PK and a FK targeting the same PK is broken in public dashboards (#44231) - special characters on the data will break subscriptions (#43677) - **Admin** - In Admin/Performance/Database caching, 12:00PM cannot be used as a time in the Schedule component (#44257) - In Admin/Performance/Database caching, when a minimum query duration is saved for an adaptive policy, the new value does not appear in the form (#44249) - **Other** - Migrate down between 50 and 49 fails when you had sandboxing configured on 49 (#44455) - Making a model with a filter and aggregation will generate wrong x-rays (#44379) - Restoring a bookmarked entity (dashboard/question/metric) leads to application crash (#44224) - SQL "Unknown column" errors on 0.50.0 with breakouts on nested models (#43993) - MB_JETTY_SKIP_SNI always evaluates to true if set and false if unset (#42435) - Database mapped field in model metadata shows None after mapping/saving (#42355) **Under the hood** - bump echarts to v5.5.1-rc.1 (#44695) - perf: disable view log and card used updates during metadata fetches (#44502) - Track metabase.nqa module dependencies (#44464) - Fix string parsing error cluttering User Parameter logs (#44420) - Don't analyse non-SQL cards with Macaw (#44350) - [MBQL lib] Put `:fields :all` on joins on deleting last aggregation (#44321) - disable invalid move targets in the recents tab (needs recents API update: effective_location) (#42980)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase v0.50.8
entry.content:
Upgrading

You can download a .jar of the release, or get the latest on Docker. Make sure to back up your Metabase database before you upgrade! Need help? Check out our upgrading instructions.

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.50.8 Download the JAR here: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.50.8/metabase.jar

Notes

SHA-256 checksum for the v0.50.8 JAR:

674c6f53c653f5a5ded0d294861df4d97ad6c113a59084475a0723c332ccafc4

Changelog

 ### Enhancements **Performance** - Address BigQuery OOM errors: Ensure we close the canceled chan in query processor after query (#44860) **Visualizations** - Surface last cached time in the frontend (#44458) **Dashboards** - Bump dashboard description max length limit to 1.5K (#44470) **Misc** - Throw an error when `import` into an empty application database (#44840) - Make SLO optional and default the SLO behavior to disabled (#44758) - Remove description length check from copy question form (#44736) - Exclude native query matches in search scoring when the search should exclude native queries (#43982) ### Bug fixes **Performance** - For a sandboxed user, thousands of appdb queries are sent during a dashboard read (#44786) **Query builder** - Unable to sort by the breakout column (#44653) - Filtering on date columns by relative dates returning wrong results (#42291) - Question editor does not work if model joins the same table more than once (#33427) **Visualizations** - Visualization error when adding a custom column after another query stage (#44668) - Can't display line or bar chart for empty result set (#44637) - Horizontal scroll disappeared on overflowing pivot table (#43215) - Invalid API request fired when clicking chart legend item (#43077) - Break out popover overflows the screen (#43075) - Using Column picker to remove columns on model breaks question with ERROR: column source.name_2 does not exist (#41785) - Remove all doesn't work when adding/removing columns (#39912) - Refresh button won't work after visualization is changed for users with no self-service access (#37374) - Unbinned geo mapping defaults to Grid instead of Pins (#10734) - Questions always say "Updated a few seconds ago" (#42778) **Dashboards** - Page hangs when one of parameters contains `{{x}}` value (#44790) - Multiple values can be used as a default value for single-value dashboard filters (#44666) **Misc** - Users that upgraded to v50 receive an email with a link that goes to a 404 (#44755) - Users created incorrectly from config.yml during an import into an uninitialized instance (#44739) - Cannot append CSV with long column name (#44724) - Migration stuck with "Running 8 migrations ..." (#44528) - Issue processing negative zero as MongoDB BigDecimal(#44506) - Fields are limited to 255 characters even when DB supports infinite text (#43983) - Oracle timestamps fingerprinting error (No implementation of method: :->temporal of protocol..) (#42325) ### Bugs already fixed We found that these bugs don't reproduce anymore and were likely fixed by work done in one of the previous releases :tada:. - Data picker shows "Saved Questions" on an empty *not yet activated* enterprise instance (#40223) - Model does not bring the options in filters although the api responds with a 200 and the values (#40193) - Cannot change question data source to raw data after selecting saved question (#36669) - Visible Columns errors when source query is a table joined on itself (#35290) - "Date range" filter: I can set a range in which "from" is a later date than "to". (#35043) - Timeseries Filter Widget jumps when opening (#34077) - Custom column with errors is removed from the question without any error being shown (#33441) - `convertTimezone` usage on unsupported databases returns confusing error (#33439) - Cumulative aggregate in Question breaks when you turn into a Model or simply add a Filter after the Aggregation (#33330) - Drilling into a filtered query from dashboard opens unfiltered query (#32804) - Summary metrics fields disappearing when joining question (#32020) - Dashboard click through behavior to a question does not pass time filters correctly (#31960) - Adding filter of summarized field grouped by latitude and longitude on a map breaks breadcrumbs (#30056) - `POST /api/util/password_check` called way too often during setup (#25712) - "Pick your starting data" motion starts before the sidebar finished collapsing / misaligns (#22783) - Closing Drop-down in Join column selector causes non-drop-down columns to disapper (#19894) - Missing drilldown options when using post-aggregation filters (#18770) - When List style field is changed to show remapped foreign key, then cached values are not updated (#15542) - API allows `count(field)` which kills the metrics page (#13814) - Join UI picks the first schema even if a different one is selected (#11958) ### Under the hood - Consolidate native E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44901) - Consolidate permissions E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44900) - Consolidate chart viz E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44899) - Consolidate tabular viz E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x branch` (#44895) - Consolidate search E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44893) - Consolidate embedding E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44892) - Consolidate native filter E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44891) - Consolidate dashboard E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44883) - Consolidate dashboard cards E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44880) - Consolidate joins E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44878) - Consolidate custom column E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44871) - Consolidate sharing E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44870) - Consolidate collections E2E reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44867) - Patch storybook to fix failed loki tests with runtime error (#44875) - Add a repro for 'Page hangs when one of parameters contains {{x}} value' (#44852) - Repro #34955: Custom column of type datetime with dashboard filter (#44838) - Unskip repro for #14957: Saving a question before query has been executed can be slow with UI "hanging" (#44825) - Repro #40635 - Metabase model does not display information correctly (#44824) - Consolidate models JS reproductions for the `release-x.50.x` branch (#44823) - add e2e test for public dashboard title (#44822) - Consolidate question reproductions 3 (#44801) - Consolidate question E2E reproductions (1 and 2) for the `release-x.50.x` branch specifically (#44799) - Unskip the repro for #18770 (Post-aggregation filters) (#44748) - Consolidate filter E2E reproductions for the release-x.50.x branch specifically (#44743) - Repro #35043: Date range filter - from newer to older date (#44687) - Fix broken field normalization in metadata (#44721) - Memoize driver.u/supports? (#44719) - Fix testing week-of-year extraction in `general-timezone-support-test` (#44583) - Split SummarizeContent from SummarizeSidebar (#44539) - E2E repro for "Fix issue with root collection in QuestionPicker" (#44318) - make enable-query-caching setting work (#44227) - Fix failures due to false positives on reserved SQL keywords (#44200) - Combine embedding e2e specs (#43843) - Consolidate chart viz e2e specs (#43619)
